title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
**Elevate Your Event with Elegance: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner (Terracotta)**

Transform your special day into a masterpiece of rustic charm and bohemian elegance with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner. Perfect for weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, and more, these sheer, 10-foot runners add a touch of romance and sophistication to any setting.

**Key Features:**
- **Premium Quality Material:** Crafted from high-quality polyester, these runners are soft to the touch, comfortable, and durable, ensuring they remain in pristine condition throughout your event and beyond.
- **Rustic Sheer Beauty:** The terracotta hue and sheer texture of these runners bring a natural, earthy vibe to your decor, making them ideal for boho and rustic themes.
- **Versatile and Elegant:** Measuring 35 inches wide by 118 inches long, these runners fit most tables and can be used in a variety of settings, from intimate gatherings to large celebrations. They are also perfect for chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, and gift wrapping.
- **Lightweight and Skin-Friendly:** The lightweight nature of the cheesecloth makes these runners easy to handle and store, while their skin-friendly material ensures they are comfortable to touch and use.
- **Reusable and Easy to Care For:** These runners are designed for longevity. Simply hand wash or machine wash them in cold water with mild detergent on a gentle cycle, and they’re ready for your next event. Avoid using hot water and do not iron to keep them looking their best.

**Package Contents:**
- 12 pieces of 35" x 118" cheesecloth table runners in a beautiful terracotta color.

**Ideal for:**
- Wedding ceremonies and receptions
- Bridal showers
- Birthday parties
- Holiday gatherings
- Restaurant and hotel decor
- Chair cover sashes
- Decorative napkins
- Gift wrapping

**Care and Maintenance:**
- **Washing:** Hand wash or machine wash in cold water with mild detergent on a gentle cycle.
- **Ironing:** Do not iron.
- **Water Temperature:** Avoid using hot water.

**Customer Support:**
- If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us. We’re here to help!

**Make Your Event Memorable:**
Whether you’re planning a rustic wedding, a boho-themed party, or a simple family gathering, our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner in terracotta will add a layer of elegance and warmth to your decor. Order yours today and bring your vision to life with these beautiful, versatile runners!
